name: Dice Paradise
description:
Dice Paradise is an aesthetically pleasing and relaxing dice-based puzzle game - so simple to pick up - the problem is putting it down again!

Clear the dice by matching rows on the board. Match dice of the same value, straights, or combos of both if you're getting fancy!

Mixing chill-hop vibes with a gorgeous vaporwave beach art style, chose the game mode to fit your mood:

*Classic Mode* -- 20 rolls to rack up the highest score possible!
*Timed Mode* -- 60 seconds to give it your all! (Each match will buy you a bit more time!)
*Chill Mode* -- The pressure is off. No timer, no roll limit, no score even! Enjoy the vibes, the chill music and the satisfaction of clearing the dice.

Stunning art and music by Pete Ellison.

It's Bingo meets Yahtzee, but on the beach in Miami with a cold drink in hand!
